text: "Auld Lang Syne" is a Scots poem written by Robert Burns in 1788 and set to the tune of a traditional folk song (Roud # 6294). It is well known in many countries, especially in the English-speaking world, its traditional use being to bid farewell to the old year at the stroke of midnight. ==References== Category:18th-century British poems Category:1780s works Category:Scottish literature
title: Auld Lang Syne
